CustomField.description: This field shows whether some, all, or none of the record's phone numbers have been validated by RingsTrue
CustomField.formula:
CASE( cloudbear__NumberFix_Status__c, "All Numbers Verified", IMAGE(LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_260, FIND( '/services', $Api.Partner_Server_URL_260))+"resource/cloudbear__All_Numbers_Verified","image1"),
"Partially Verified", IMAGE(LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_260, FIND( '/services', $Api.Partner_Server_URL_260))+"/resource/cloudbear__Partially_Verified", "image2"),
"No Verified Numbers", IMAGE(LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_260, FIND( '/services', $Api.Partner_Server_URL_260))+"/resource/cloudbear__Number_not_Verified","image3"), "No Entered Numbers", IMAGE(LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_260, FIND( '/services', $Api.Partner_Server_URL_260))+"/resource/cloudbear__Partially_Verified","image4"),"" )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field shows whether some, all, or none of the record's phone numbers have been validated by RingsTrue
CustomField.label: RingsTrue Verified
